Title: Relates to application for a driver's license; repealer
Summary: Requires a foreign driver's license used as a proof of age and identity to apply for a driver's license to be valid and unexpired and makes technical corrections.
LawCode: Amd ยง502, rpld ยง502 sub 1, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to application for a driver's license; and to repeal certain provisions of such law related thereto
